00043 ServerKeepaliveHandler::ServerKeepaliveHandler(Comm *comm, Master *master,
00044                                                ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue_ptr)
00045   : m_comm(comm), m_master(master), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue_ptr) {
00046   int error;
00047 
00048   m_master->get_datagram_send_address(&m_send_addr);
00049 
00050   if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(1000, this)) != Error::OK) {
00051     HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00052     exit(1);
00053   }
00054 
00055   return;
00056 }

00063 void ServerKeepaliveHandler::handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event) {
00064   int error;
00065 
00066   if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::MESSAGE) {
00067     const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event->payload;
00068     size_t decode_remain = event->payload_len;
00069 
00070     try {
00071 
00072       // sanity check command code
00073       if (event->header.command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX)
00074         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Invalid command (%llu)",
00075                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00076 
00077       switch (event->header.command) {
00078       case Protocol::COMMAND_KEEPALIVE: {
00079           uint64_t session_id = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00080           uint64_t last_known_event = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00081           bool shutdown = decode_bool(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00082           
00083           m_app_queue_ptr->add( new RequestHandlerRenewSession(m_comm,
00084               m_master, session_id, last_known_event, shutdown, event, 
00085               &m_send_addr ) );
00086         }  
00087         break;
00088       default:
00089         HT_THROWF(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Unimplemented command (%llu)",
00090                   (Llu)event->header.command);
00091       }
00092     }
00093     catch (Exception &e) {
00094       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00095     }
00096   }
00097   else if (event->type == Hypertable::Event::TIMER) {
00098 
00099     try {
00100       m_app_queue_ptr->add( new RequestHandlerExpireSessions(m_master) );
00101     }
00102     catch (Exception &e) {
00103       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00104     }
00105 
00106     if ((error = m_comm->set_timer(1000, this)) != Error::OK) {
00107       HT_ERRORF("Problem setting timer - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00108       exit(1);
00109     }
00110 
00111   }
00112   else {
00113     HT_INFOF("%s", event->to_str().c_str());
00114   }
00115 }

00121 void ServerKeepaliveHandler::deliver_event_notifications(uint64_t session_id) {
00122   int error = 0;
00123   SessionDataPtr session_ptr;
00124 
00125   //HT_INFOF("Delivering event notifications for session %lld", session_id);
00126 
00127   if (!m_master->get_session(session_id, session_ptr)) {
00128     HT_ERRORF("Unable to find data for session %llu", (Llu)session_id);
00129     return;
00130   }
00131 
00137   CommBufPtr cbp(Protocol::create_server_keepalive_request(session_ptr));
00138   if ((error = m_comm->send_datagram(session_ptr->addr, m_send_addr, cbp))
00139       != Error::OK) {
00140     HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_datagram returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00141   }
00142 
00143 }
